name: Deputy Steel
descriptions: Deputy Steel is a Mister Gutsy that guards Megaton's armory in 2277.
If one enters then exits the armory, he will follow them outside, thus causing the town to turn hostile towards the player character.

The line "What is your major malfunction, maggot?" is a reference to the 1987 movie Full Metal Jacket, in which it is spoken by Gunnery Sergeant Hartman, right before he is shot by Private Lawrence ("Pyle").
PC Sometimes, upon fast traveling to Megaton, he will spawn right in front of the player character instead of inside the armory.

topics.response_text: Another glorious day in this man's army!
Pansy! Take a shot of vitamin M and keep fighting!{Spoken like a marine drill sergeant}
Head wound! Too bad you're out of morhpine.{Spoken like a marine drill sergeant}
Listen up you god-damn puke! You are now wearing prototype medic power armor. You take care of me, and I'll take care of you.{Shouted like a marine drill sergeant.}

conversation.response_text: Do that again and I'll put my foot so far up your ass you'll cough up boot polish!
What is your major malfunction, maggot?
Eat hot lead, you commie bastard!
Tell my mama I've done my best.
You had better remove yourself from this area before I am forced to declare you an enemy of the U.S. of A.
You are the lowest form of commie scumbag I've ever had the misfortune to lay eyes on!
Please tell me that you did not just do what I think you did!
I thought I had seen every species of moronic petty bullshit, but you've just topped the list. Congratulations.

combat.response_text: Are you afraid of me? You should be because I'm going to kick your ass when I find you!
You're gonna learn how Uncle Sam deals with commie maggots!
Another glorious day in the U.S. army.
Somebody find me something to shoot at!
That's how we do things in the U.S. army! Hoo-ah!
You better run, you commie-loving bastard!
You cannot hide from me, you commie maggot!
Is that someone who needs me to kick their ass?
Ready to die for your country, you commie son of a bitch?
